ThingShape.description: Thing Shape that holds all the necessary properties and services for manipulating work definition definitions in the database {PTC.SCA.SCO.WorkDefinitionManagementThingShape}
ThingShape.name: PTC.SCA.SCO.WorkDefinitionManagementThingShape

ServiceDefinition.description: Gets execution status change log for specified work definition
ServiceDefinition.name: GetWorkDefinitionExecutionLog

ServiceDefinition.description: Gets execution status summery for specified work definition
ServiceDefinition.name: GetWorkDefinitionExecutionSummary

FieldDefinition.description: Additional filers that should be applied when querying the table that the given datashape represents for related objects of the given Workdefinition. The filter should be fully formed and can be used to successfully query the table that the given datashape represents.
FieldDefinition.name: Filter
